column2: You have managed to find the One Ring at long last. Your servants bring it to Barad-dur in triumph, where they take it to the central chamber of the tower.  The Nazgûl surround the Ring placed at the centre of the huge hall. Your power surges back into the Ring, your material form rebuilding until, finally, you stand.
The Dark Lord Sauron the Great has regained the One Ring and returned to his former strength.
A second darkness comes at last!
